sec.p: How to cite this article: Cline, T. J. et al. Fisheries portfolio diversification and turnover buffer Alaskan fishing communities from abrupt resource and market changes. Nat. Commun. 8, 14042 doi: 10.1038/ncomms14042 (2017).
